caption.p: Neutralizing activity of novel sand flyâ€“associated phlebovirus Ntepes virus from Kenya in relation to other selected members of the Phlebovirus genus. Anti-GFV and anti-KARV samples were tested along with 26 human serum samples. GFV, Gabek Forest virus; H, human; KARV, Karimabad virus; NPV, Ntepes virus; NT, neutralizing test; RVFV, Rift Valley fever virus.
